lead_paragraph: Heat center Hassan Whiteside has been ruled out of Monday's Game 4 of Miami's Eastern Conference semifinal series against the Toronto Raptors with a sprained ligament in his right knee.

headline.print_headline: Whiteside Ruled Out of Game 4 of Miami-Toronto Series
headline.main: Whiteside Ruled Out of Game 4 of Miami-Toronto Series

snippet: Heat center Hassan Whiteside has been ruled out of Monday's Game 4 of Miami's Eastern Conference semifinal series against the Toronto Raptors with a sprained ligament in his right knee....
